column4: is there anything better than ndiswrapper? I get DC'd a lot and have trouble connecting to WPA2. It connects to unsecured fine, but we are not allowed to use that here.
its an Atheros card
whats the problem with your atheros card?

Well, since its one of the newer ones I had to ndiswrapper it, but its very unstable with wpa2. I have a lot of trouble connecting, get dc'd a lot, and eventually it wont let me connect again until I restart computer.
undo the ndiswrapper and i will show you how to get it working
since I am kinda on that wifi atm, I will undo it after I know what to do next. ^_^
try this and tell me if it works linux-backports-modules-karmic-generic
i just bought my laptop and it has a atheros card
Yeah, I got this 2 weeks ago
will undo the ndiswrapper shortly and see if that works instead.
i can almost guarantee it will i had the exact same problem
and I wont use Ndiswrapper at all correct?
system monitor?
yeah, I guess its called that
no, the thing that lists stuff that you can kill. Or was that app KDE only?
system monitor :P
I can't see it I guess. I have an application that is stuck on my screen
open terminal and type xkill
THankyou!
np
ok, no wifi with that. Was I supposed to do something after I installed that?
and there is nothing listed under Proprietary drivers
